New Records: Chris Woakes broke Ian Botham’s England record for most World Cup wickets with his 31st wicket
Key Match Events: Abdullah Shafique lbw first ball to David Willey
Adil Rashid dismissed Saud Shakeel and Shadab Khan
Mohammad Wasim Jr and Rauf scored 16 and 35 respectively
Pre-Game Insights: England’s hopes of retaining the World Cup suffered a blow
England played without pressure in this match
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler played down talk of a 'clearout'
England will bid farewell in the haze of bustling Kolkata
Miscellaneous Highlights: David Willey reached 100 one-day international wickets
Jonny Bairstow and Joe Root laid the platform for an admittedly chaotic late thrash
Shaheen Shah Afridi detonated his off stump with a wonderful yorker
The terrific crowd had thinned out
